mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM member WHERE loginId = #{loginId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `member` SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), authStatus = 0, loginId = #{loginId}, loginPw = #{loginPw}, `name` = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE `member` SET delDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
